#summary ThreadSanitizer build bot

We have a [http://build.chromium.org/buildbot/tsan/waterfall continuous build of ThreadSanitizer] where the fresh binaries are built regularly. 
When downloading a fresh binary make sure that the build bot is green. 

=Linux, Mac=

You may download the latest ThreadSanitizer binaries at
http://build.chromium.org/buildbot/tsan/binaries.<BR>
For example, for x86_64 Linux you will need the binary [http://build.chromium.org/buildbot/tsan/binaries/tsan-r1908-amd64-linux-self-contained.sh].

To get it do:
{{{
wget http://build.chromium.org/buildbot/tsan/binaries/tsan-r1908-amd64-linux-self-contained.sh
chmod +x tsan-r1908-amd64-linux-self-contained.sh
}}}

=Windows=
For Windows, also go to http://build.chromium.org/buildbot/tsan/binaries and grab the self-extracting archive called *tsan-rxxx-x86-windows-sfx.exe*. <BR>
For example, [http://build.chromium.org/buildbot/tsan/binaries/tsan-r1951-x86-windows-sfx.exe]. <BR>
See ThreadSanitizerForWindows
